import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Input, Card, Typography, Form, Checkbox } from 'antd' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import axios from 'axios' const { Search } = Input const { Title, Paragraph } = Typography export default function UniversalSearch() { const [ esData, setEsData ] = useState([]) const [ isChecked, setIsChecked ] = useState(false) const onSearch = async value => { let emptyArray = [] await axios({ method: 'get', url: `https://68ef17ae206a41b485fa164d62a92012.us-east-1.aws.found.io:9243/sc_transaction_demo_v2/_search?q=${value}&size=10000`, auth: { username: 'sp_es_write', password: 'JxpZzs8hRV4X7' } }) .then( res => { res.data.hits.hits.map( row => emptyArray.push(row._source) ) console.log(emptyArray) setEsData(emptyArray) }) } const tableColumns = [ { title: 'Customer Name', key: 'customer_name', dataIndex: 'customer_name', ...getColumnSearchProps('customer_name'), render: (_, record) => (
{ record.customer_name }
), sorter: (a, b) => utils.antdTableSorter(a, b, 'customer_name'), colSpan: 1, width: '5%' }, { title: 'Content Name', key: 'content_name', dataIndex: 'content_name', ...getColumnSearchProps('content_name'), render: (_, record) => (
{ record.content_name }
), sorter: (a, b) => utils.antdTableSorter(a, b, 'content_name'), colSpan: 1, width: '8.5%' }, { title: 'Product', key: 'product', dataIndex: 'product', ...getColumnSearchProps('product'), render: (_, record) => ( <>{ record.product } ), sorter: (a, b) => utils.antdTableSorter(a, b, 'product'), colSpan: 1 }, { title: 'Segment', key: 'segment', dataIndex: 'segment', ...getColumnSearchProps('segment'), render: (_, record) => ( <>{ record.segment } ), sorter: (a, b) => utils.antdTableSorter(a, b, 'segment'), colSpan: 1 }, { title: 'Type', key: 'type', dataIndex: 'type', ...getColumnSearchProps('type'), render: (_, record) => ( <>{ record.type } ), sorter: (a, b) => utils.antdTableSorter(a, b, 'type'), colSpan: 1 }, { title: 'Level', key: 'level', dataIndex: 'level', ...getColumnSearchProps('level'), render: (_, record) => ( <>{ record.level } ), sorter: (a, b) => Number(a.level) - Number(b.level), colSpan: 1 }, { title: 'Category', key: 'category', dataIndex: 'category', ...getColumnSearchProps('category'), render: (_, record) => ( <>{ record.category } ), sorter: (a, b) => utils.antdTableSorter(a, b, 'category'), colSpan: 1 }, { title: 'Language', key: 'language', dataIndex: 'language', ...getColumnSearchProps('language'), render: (_, record) => ( <>{ record.language } ), sorter: (a, b) => utils.antdTableSorter(a, b, 'language'), colSpan: 1 }, { title: 'Content', key: 'content', dataIndex: 'content', ...getColumnSearchProps('content'), render: (_, record) => (
{ record.content }
), sorter: (a, b) => utils.antdTableSorter(a, b, 'content'), colSpan: 1, width: '15%' }, { title: 'Translated Content', key: 'translated_content', dataIndex: 'translated_content', ...getColumnSearchProps('translated_content'), render: (_, record) => (
{ record.translated_content }
), sorter: (a, b) => utils.antdTableSorter(a, b, 'translated_content'), colSpan: 1, }, { title: 'Version', dataIndex: 'version', key: 'version', ...getColumnSearchProps('version'), render: (_, record) => ( <>{ record.version } ), sorter: (a, b) => a.version - b.version, colSpan: 1 }, { title: 'Transaction Status', key: 'status', dataIndex: 'status', ...getColumnSearchProps('transaction_status'), render: (_, record) => ( <>{ record.status } ), sorter: (a, b) => utils.antdTableSorter(a, b, 'status'), colSpan: 1 }, { title: 'Last Updated', key: 'last_updated_on', dataIndex: 'last_updated_on', ...getColumnSearchProps('last_updated_on'), render: (_, record) => ( { record.last_updated_on.split(' GMT')[0] } ), sorter: (a, b) => utils.antdTableSorter(a, b, 'last_updated_on'), colSpan: 1 }, { title: 'Last Updated By', key: 'last_updated_by', dataIndex: 'last_updated_by', ...getColumnSearchProps('last_updated_by'), render: (_, record) => ( <>{ record.last_updated_by } ), sorter: (a, b) => utils.antdTableSorter(a, b, 'last_updated_by'), colSpan: 1 }, { title: 'Recording Link', key: 'recording_link', dataIndex: 'recording_link', ...getColumnSearchProps('recording_link'), render: (_, record) => (
{ record.recording_link }
), sorter: (a, b) => utils.antdTableSorter(a, b, 'recording_link'), colSpan: 1 }, { title: '', key: 'actions', dataIndex: 'actions', render: (_, elm) => (
), colSpan: 1 } ] const onChange = e => setIsChecked(e.target.value) return (
